name: Ad Jocker
description:
An endless ad blocker for Giant ROM 3.

Help:

Move with the arrow keys.

Try to hit the ads without running into the GB billboards.

Made With:

  • Unity
  • Blender
  • GarageBand
  • Affinity Designer
  • Futurist by WSI
  • Rektec by Axel Lymphos
  • Silkscreen by Jason Kottke
  • Carton Six by Jayvee Enaguas
  • Sports World by Sergiy S. Tkachenko
  • Mighty by Mujahid Alawy
